titles.title: American Gateway Communities Economic Development and Conservation Act
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to establish a Gateway Communities Improvement Program, and for other purposes.
American Gateway Communities Economic Development and Conservation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

bill.summary:
American Gateway Communities Economic Development and Conservation Act
This bill directs the Department of the Interior to establish an American Gateway Communities Economic Development and Conservation Program. Interior may provide grants under the program to assist local government entities in improving gateways to National Park System units.
